review.title: “Innovative and Resourceful Services Firm”
review.pros: Pros – Constantly working to improve the recruiting process to provide a partnership relationship with clients. Often worked as exclusive provider. Leadership really knew her stuff and had great relationships with technology community in Houston.
review.cons: Cons – Unfortunately, market factors effected several clients at one time. As exclusive provider, demand for talent set the tone for the company's volume of business and ability to hire and employ recruiters.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Develop leaders to do more business development.

review.title: “Opportunity for large commissions”
review.pros: Pros – Nice work environment; flexible hours
review.cons: Cons – No contract positions to recruit on.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
